text: @atrupar So, @kayleighmcenany @PressSec you bust out a few binders 2 months after the initial Covid-19 Rose Garden press conference and we are supposed to believe that you had a plan? Who, besides the dumbasses that are already Trump voters, would believe that bullshit?
